metadata.title: API keys
metadata.description: This section allows you to securely store, update, and manage API keys for different AI services (such as OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, etc.). Connecting your keys enables personalized AI interactions while keeping your credentials protected.

api_key_placeholder: Please describe the purpose of an Api Key.
api_key_description: API keys must be kept confidential (e.g., stored in environment variables) to avoid exploitation or unexpected charges.
delete_api_key_confirm: Confirm deletion of the API key?
